doc.title: Sobrevivir
doc.plot: A history of coexistence and solidarity, where the love prevails for above everything. The world of the main characters is developed in the cultivation of flowers "The Brown of property of the family Visbal, rich and powerful for who the workers are instruments to achieve their goals economic. "The Brown one is administered by the agricultural Genaro Salazar good and honest man, for the one who Matilde - their hand right in the cultivation - it is their great love. Matilde's life rotates in lathe of their daughters for who it professes a obsessive love that takes him to to seek to control them in end, to the one point of sacrificing their own one existence and to generate a confrontation of two generations. That life that teaches him to not to be allowed concessions, to be demanded too much until sacrificing their love by Genaro when the is threatened stability of their family.
